[PIE-1798] Added some multitenancy fail case tests.

Signed-off-by: Mark Terry <mark.terry@consensys.net>

timeline.bodyText: Can this have a more generic name as this is not specific to multitenancy. Perhaps something like ExpectJsonRpcError?
timeline.author: jframe

timeline.bodyText: Can this port be made dynamic? Otherwise will probably have problems with port conflicts at some point with multiple ATs running in parallel.
timeline.author: jframe

replies.bodyText: Good idea.  Changed other AT class as well.
replies.author: mark-terry

timeline.bodyText: Can use Transaction<Hash> instead of the raw type here and for the other tests
timeline.author: jframe

timeline.bodyText: Suggest using ENCLAVE_PUBLIC_KEY as enclave key can also refer to the key we get back after sending data to the enclave.
timeline.author: jframe

timeline.bodyText: Suggest using OTHER_ENCLAVE_PUBLIC_KEY to avoid confusing with enclave key
timeline.author: jframe
jframe

replies.bodyText: Is that required?  I'm just testing the fail paths through MultiTenancyPrivacyController.
replies.author: mark-terry

replies.bodyText: Yeah I think so as we can't test the MultiTenancyPrivacyController directly. It's possible that privDistributeRawTransaction could change at some point to just call into the enclave and bypass the validation
replies.author: jframe
